name: S1:E2/3 "The Slumber Party" & "A Kicking Weasel" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions
tags: Saved By The Bell: The New Class

questions.text: Ep. 2: Who dressed as a girl to sneak into the party?
questions.explanation:
Scott.

	Scott was still trying to figure out the dating scene at Bayside and trying to convince Lindsay to go out with him.

questions.text: Ep. 2: Who fell in love with Tina at first sight?
questions.explanation:
Crunch.

	Scott dressed in drag as his "cousin" Tina for the party. Crunch delivered pizza to the party and got a look at Tina and fell instantly in love. He turned into a blubbering fool when he thought she'd gotten on a plane to go home.

questions.text: Ep. 2: What school was the "big game" against?
questions.explanation:
Valley.

	Crunch was the star and captain of the football team as they were preparing to go up against longtime rival Valley. When Tina left he fell into a depression and was nearly unable to play. This got Scott to dress as Tina once again and come to the pep rally/dance where he was caught by Tommy D.

questions.text: Ep. 2: Where was Tina supposedly from?
questions.explanation:
Wisconsin.

	The story was that she was visiting her family in California. Scott convinced Lindsay to invite her to the slumber party while he worked to set up the pep rally.

questions.text: Ep. 2: Who served as the DJ for the dance?
questions.explanation:
Weasel.

	Weasel was the DJ, and was supposed to stop the music if Crunch tried to dance with "Tina" as Scott didn't want to cross that line. Eventually Weasel was tricked into starting the music up when Megan commented that she'd dance with him if he could fix the sound system.

questions.text: Ep. 3: Before becoming the kicker, what position did Weasel have on the football team?
questions.explanation:
Waterboy.

	In the opening scene Weasel was walking in the hallway carrying all of the equipment for the team. He served as both the equipment manager and the water boy. After he kicked the ball in practice once, he was bumped up to team kicker.

questions.text: Ep. 3: Mr. Belding had the JV cheer team attend the "big match". What sport was it?
questions.explanation:
Ping Pong.

	There were four people on the Bayside ping pong team. Other than the other team, Mr. Belding and the cheerleaders there wasn't anyone else in the gym for the match. They lost the meet and one of the ping pong players started crying.

questions.text: Ep. 3: Who wasn't one of the three girls competing for the spot on the varsity cheerleading team.
questions.explanation:
Lisa.

	Scott fixed the competition to help Lindsay win. Lisa wasn't a character on the series that season. Megan, Vicki and Lindsay were the three main female characters.

questions.text: Ep. 3: What jersey number did Weasel get when he joined the team's active roster?
questions.explanation:
3.

	Weasel walked into the Max wearing a #3 Wyzell jersey. T.J., one of the other players, continued to make fun of him and called it beginner's luck even after a practice.

questions.text: Ep. 3: Did Bayside win the game against Westwood?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	Scott and Tommy D used their own money, and money from the print shop fund to print up "Win with Weasel" shirts after his big practice.  Then the next day Weasel couldn't kick the ball anymore. He realized he kicked well when he was angry, but couldn't kick at all when he was happy. Scott and Tommy D both worked to make Weasel angry again before the game.  Weasel kicked 11 field goals and they won the game 33-10.
